info.lead: An overview of analysis of the latest session available at {link}.
info.words-text: We perform the analysis according to the tf-idf statistic. The corpus are all speeches while the documents are all speeches at this particular session.
info.presence-text: Parliamentary groups are sorted based on the percentage of votes their members attended.
info.votes-text: We count individual votes (FOR, AGAINST, ABSTAIN) for all voting events at the session and the number of members who didn't vote and display the results.
